entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpf3uv3l4n/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0004.9288] Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities with a value of -2,048,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations and Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations ( -2,048,000,000 + -77,000,000 ) with a value of -2,125,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities fact are: Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities : -6 Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations : -6 Decimals of Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations : -6
Rule Element Id:9288 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1657853/000165785319000005/htz-20181231.xml 14012

property.name: label
property.value: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0004.9288] Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities with a value of -2,048,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations and Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations ( -2,048,000,000 + -77,000,000 ) with a value of -2,125,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this us-gaap:NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivities fact are: Period :2016-01-01 to 2016-12-31 Dimensions : dei:LegalEntityAxis=htz:TheHertzCorporationMember Unit : USD Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities : -6 Decimals of Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations : -6 Decimals of Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations : -6
Rule Element Id:9288 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1657853/000165785319000005/htz-20181231.xml 14013
